item.title: Mac Tips
item.description:
Mac Tips

Published: Jul 31, 2020 Tags: efficiency Category: ComputerScience

I got first Macbook 3 years ago, but only use Macbook as production environment 9 months ago. In order to use Macbook in an efficient way, some tips can be important to know.

Short cut keys

Capture window

+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------+ | Command + Shift + 5 | Record video for screen | +-------------------------------+-----------------------------------+ | Command + Shift + 4 | Capture screen to file | +-------------------------------+-----------------------------------+ | Command + Shift + 4 + space | Capture current screen | +-------------------------------+-----------------------------------+ | Command + Control + Shift + 4 | Capture screen to clip-board | +-------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
